message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $11,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it brings.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?
I'm still a bit far from $10,250. How about we meet at $9,800? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
